# creationDate

**Instance Property**

The date when the content item was created, or the date when it was first broadcast, or some other kind of origination date.

## Declaration

```swift
var creationDate: Date? { get set }
```

## Inspecting the Content Properties

- **duration**: The amount of time required to play the media to completion.
- **expirationDate**: The date when the user will no longer be able to access the item.
- **imageShape**: The intended aspect ratio or shape of the content image.
- **TVContentItemImageShape**: An enumerated type that identifies the shape in which the content item should be displayed.
